data.title: It's a buffet
data.statement:
You have a box containing N sandwiches and another box containing M iced tea bottles, you decided that you can't eat and drink all of it so now you want to share with people.
Each person including you can take exactly 3 items, that is either ONE sandwich and TWO bottles,  or ONE bottle and TWO sandwiches.
for each test case print "YES" if both boxes will be empty at the end, else print "NO"

data.stubGenerator:
read T:int
loop T read A:int B:int 
loop T write YES/NO
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[T]] for the number of tests.
<<Next [[T]] lines:>> Two space separated integers [[A]] and [[B]], [[A]] being the number of sandwiches and [[B]] the number of iced tea bottles you have.
data.outputDescription: T strings  [["YES"]] or [["NO"]] (without quotes) separated by newlines.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You have a box containing N sandwiches and another box containing M iced tea bottles, you decided that you can't eat and drink all of it so now you want to share with people.
Each person including you can take exactly 3 items, that is either ONE sandwich and TWO bottles, or ONE bottle and TWO sandwiches.
for each test case print "YES" if both boxes will be empty at the end, else print "NO"
Input
Line 1: An integer T for the number of tests.
Next T lines: Two space separated integers A and B, A being the number of sandwiches and B the number of iced tea bottles you have.
Output
T strings "YES" or "NO" (without quotes) separated by newlines.
Constraints
1 ≤ T ≤ 200
0 <= x,y < 1000
Example
Input
1
11 4
Output
NO
